unnormalised: Spotted! Rumour mills are buzzing louder than a Mumbai local train after eyewitnesses saw Bollywood heartthrob Ranbir Kapoor and rising starlet, Ananya Sharma, sharing a *chai* at Prithvi Cafe last Tuesday! Was it just a casual catch-up, or is something brewing hotter than a Chennai summer?
normalised: Spotted! Rumor mills are buzzing louder than a Mumbai local train after eyewitnesses saw Bollywood heartthrob Ranbir Kapoor and rising starlet, Ananya Sharma, sharing a chai at Prithvi Cafe last Tuesday! Was it just a casual catch-up, or is something brewing hotter than a Chennai summer?

unnormalised: Sources close to Dharma Productions, where Ananya is apparently auditioning for a role in Karan Johar's next big flick, are saying it could all be just professional networking. But come on, folks, *chai* dates at Prithvi Cafe? That screams more than just script discussions!
normalised: Sources close to Dharma Productions, where Ananya is apparently auditioning for a role in Karan Johar's next big flick, are saying it could all be just professional networking. But come on, folks, chai dates at Prithvi Cafe? That screams more than just script discussions!

unnormalised: Fans are already going wild, flooding social media with theories and 'evidence'. One user even pointed out Ananya was wearing a pendant similar to the one Ranbir sported in *Ae Dil Hai Mushkil*! Coincidence? We think not!
normalised: Fans are already going wild, flooding social media with theories and 'evidence'. One user even pointed out Ananya was wearing a pendant similar to the one Ranbir sported in Ae Dil Hai Mushkil! Coincidence? We think not!

unnormalised: Meanwhile, Ranbir's PR team is keeping mum, fueling the fire even more. Guess we'll just have to wait and watch if this *jodi* becomes the next big thing. Stay tuned for more spicy updates!
